structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.text: Any person violating KRS 223.080 may be fined not more than one thousand dollars ($1,000) or imprisoned not more than six (6) months.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 309, sec. 10, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 102, sec. 8, effective July 1, 1960.
